job.title: Staff Bioinformatics Scientist, Cancer Screening Research
job.description: stronguCompany DescriptionbrbrustrongCompany Description Guardant Health is a leading precision oncology company focused on helping conquer cancer globally through use of its proprietary blood tests vast data sets and advanced analytics The Guardant Health Oncology Platform leverages capabilities to drive commercial adoption improve patient clinical outcomes and lower healthcare costs across all stages of the cancer care continuum Guardant Health has launched liquid biopsybased Guardant360 Guardant360 CDx and GuardantOMNI tests for advanced stage cancer patients These tests fuel development of its LUNAR program which aims to address the needs of earlystage cancer patients with neoadjuvant and adjuvant treatment selection cancer survivors with surveillance asymptomatic individuals eligible for cancer screening and individuals at a higher risk for developing cancer with early detectionbrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongAbout the rolebrbrstrongAt Guardant Health we are committed to positively and significantly impacting patient health through technology breakthroughs that address longstanding unmet needs in oncology As the leader in the field of liquid biopsy Guardant Health is looking for a bioinformatics scientist excited about conducting research in an interdisciplinary environment to enable breakthroughs in cancer patient care We are looking for an individual who will take ownership of innovative projects that utilize highthoughput signals as well as novel assay development and are geared to contribute to Guardants vision of Cancer Care through liquid biopsies with an emphasis on Early Cancer DetectionbrbrWe are working at the forefront of scientific and technological innovations developing novel methodologies that deliver substantial clinical impact to patients If this is something you are pattionate about come join usbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliDesign prototype and analyze statistical modeling approaches on NGS and novel data typesliliExplore and characterize signals relevant to early cancer detection from largescale dataliliCommunicate analysis results to stakeholders across computational and experimental teamsliliAbility to take ownership of exploratory projects and identify potential new product featuresliliContribute to a highly collaborative work environment participating in brainstorming sessions and maintaining a motivating work environmentliliDevelop reproducible analyses for research and development activitiesliliProvide written documentation and specificationsbrliulstronguAbout YoubrustrongulliDedicated to making a difference in a rapidpaced startup environmentliliPhD in computer science statistics computational biology or related fieldsliliExperience with analysis of highthroughput NGS data in the context of genomics epigenomics or other applicationsliliStrong background in statistical fundamentals and analysis including inference approaches and iterative model developmentlili5 years experience in industryacademia postgraduationliliExperience developing and implementing novel methods in an openended datalimited settingliliAbility to design and execute analyses in an openended datalimited settingliliProficiency with a high level scripting language eg Python RliliProficiency with Linux commandline and version control tools git and GitHubliliExcellent communication skills in an interdisciplinary environmentbrliulstrongPREFFEREDbrstrongulliBackground in immunology andor cancer immunologyliliFamiliarity with highperformance computing infrastructures eg SGE SparkliliExperience leveraging AWSbased services eg EC2 S3 to speed analysesbrliulstrongIf these descriptions fit your interests and background we look forward to discussing our exciting projects with youbrbrstrongAdditional InformationbrbremGuardant Health is an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disabilitybrbrem
